name: Alea (itch) (chisenoa)
description:
Greetings!

Alea is a simulation fighting game where vegetables fight

Does It Have a Story?

No story but angry eggplant and cool banana fighting

This game was made in 48 hours with Every Input Does Two Things theme for Jamination 5 hosted by Jamination and Beikoz

Controls

Click: LMB
Watch: Your Eyes

Who Play This Game?

• Those who like to simulation-idle games
• People in the Jamination 5
• Angry eggplant and cool banana
• Companies that will sue me for copyright due to the musics in the game
• My friends who are curious about the game i made (Nobody)

System Requirements

You can even play on a Roulette

Credits

Alperen Güner - Game Designer
Alperen Güner - Programmer
Alperen Güner - Pixel Artist
Alperen Güner - Sound Designer
Alperen Güner - Project Manager

Tyler Durden - Psychological Support
